subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] for Bruce Halliday - A technician request
author: bruce halliday
full_text:
--_94cc4e07-1a3a-41f4-8f56-c045212b938b_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


Ron,
 
First thank you for your kind comments but the only difference betw=
een you and I is the time I have been researching.
You will surely get ther=
e especially with the effort you are making in a tough situation, most woul=
d have just given up.
You can believe that our friends on the other side ap=
preciate that kind of dedication.
 
That being said, when you do a session =
with the box the communication is mainly formulated by our friends using th=
e fragments of sound coming from the radio signal you recieve.
Is it possib=
le to get communication with this little number of available stations ? Yes=
 but it will be limited in the fact that the communicating spirit will need=
 to wait that much longer 
to try and catch coinciding fragment to form an =
individual word or phrase. The theory is, the more signal you have, the mor=
e fragments of words you have , the easier for our friends to utilize them =
to form mor and cuncurrent words phrases and even whole sentences.
 
I am s=
ure they are aware of your particular curcumstances and are putting in the =
extra effort to try and solve the problem and at least get whatever communi=
cation they can across.
But you also have to do your level best to facilita=
te a good signal and reception, working together in harmony with your spiri=
t communicators and fellow researchers will aid in the strenthening of all =
our communication. So don't give up and don't get to frustrated approach th=
e sessions with a positive outlook and that energy alone will help boost co=
mmunication. And I'm sure we here will do all we can to help.
 
As for the =
spanish language signals, It does not matter what language the transmition =
of the signal is in because they do not utilise full radio words or sentenc=
es to communicate, they put the words together using bits and pieces of the=
 radio signal so even if you where doing research in china or germany and r=
ecieved only signals in that native language your spirit friends, knowing y=
ou personaly would use the fragments of sound to form their communication i=
n your own language. they become your personal friends and protectors and w=
ill do everything in their power to communicate with you. All you need is a=
n open mind and heart, they will take care of the rest.
 
Juli valazqueaz w=
ill be posting a session data sheet, I suggest you use one for every sessio=
n to determine if there are certain times and conditions in your location t=
hat are better than others for doing a session.
 
any other questions you h=
ave no matter how dumb you think they are please feel free to contact me on=
 the the board or by e-mail  paranormalinvestigating@...
 
Bruce
 
=
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: ronriko@...: W=
ed, 9 Jan 2008 06:46:19 -0800Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] for Bruce Halliday - A =
technician request





Thanks for the encouragement Bruce.  You are correc=
t I have a rs 12-469 and I cut the pin so it scans continually when needed.=
   I at times used audacity on my computer to record, thinking that speed c=
ontrol would be useful to interpret messages...nice thought.   I like the s=
implicity of your suggestion to just plug the radio directly into the digit=
al recorder.  Not knowing exactly how all this goes down, I thought the rad=
io scan sounds need to mix in the room so that the techs on the other side =
can respond.  Whatever works.  
 
The other main question I have is regardi=
ng the radio stations I can pick up here in my part of Mexico, on the Yucat=
an.  I only get several stations during a complete scan of all a.m. or f.m.=
 channels...don't know if that is enough.  It has been suggested that I som=
ehow can add an antenna to search for more channels, which I would attempt =
if it is really necessary.  I get mostly Spanish language stations and an o=
ccasional station from Texas that skips across the Gulf of Mexico.  Not muc=
h to scan.  Any thoughts on this?
 
By the way, I think the work you are do=
ing is, well, extraordinary.    Like pros from any other field of endeavor,=
 you make this stuff look easy to do...not so.  Thanks again.   Ron L  
bru=
ce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:


Hey Ron L., In m=
y experience it does not matter what language you recieve the signal in.The=
 entities are using only fragments, small bits and pieces of the radio sign=
alto form the words. Therefore it does not matter if the radio signal is in=
 spanish or english or any other language for that matter. Our friends on t=
he other side will manipulate the fragments they need to communicate with y=
ou in the language you will understand. Ron you mention that you are using =
an rs 690 that is not one of the hack model numbers maybe you have gotten t=
he wrong radio model. Check the part number it must be a 12-469or a 12-470 =
and if it is the 470 it would have to be the older model or it could not be=
 modified. Can you verify that you have modified the rs radio and that it i=
s continually scanning withoutstopping on any one particular station? Also =
there would be no need for EVP maker or a microphone to be used during a se=
ssion with the RS boxall you would need is the RS box and a digital recorde=
r, if you have the 469 you would need speakers to record the session or plu=
g the digital recorder directly into the radio. Please check your equipment=
 and how it is operating and let me know so I can help you further.Don't wo=
rry they are just waiting for you to set up the correct equipment and they =
will communicate. Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: =
ronriko@...: Tue, 8 Jan 2008 11:16:51 -0800Subject: [EVP-ITC] for=
 Bruce Halliday - A technician request


Bruce, I now have done a few days =
testing with my rs 690, evp maker, audacity, a mic, and my handheld digital=
 recorder.  Nada, nothing, zilch.  Maybe because I only get to scan past 5 =
to 8 channels on Am or FM so I don't have enough signals to muster a respon=
se.  But from what you and others with experience seem to be saying, it sho=
uldn't matter because I will get help from someone on the other-side.  Mayb=
e they can't find me in Mexico?  Please let your techs know I am here...sho=
uld be no problem with immigration papers or money exchange.  I really need=
 help.  Ron Lbruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote: 

=

Ann,That may be, But I find that when I do a session mike and lisa both co=
me through but mike seems to be the more dominant one. I have asked that mi=
ke and lisa help in your sessions as well as other new researchers and they=
 seem to comply but I think mikeis more like a supervisor and delegates act=
ions to other techs. I know that if you do not have a perminent tech that w=
hatever techis available at the time you do your session will be assigned t=
o assist you. If it is lisa she is very sweet and will do her best to give =
you solid communication. I'm glad she can help. Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To:=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: lisby@...: Tue, 8 Jan 2008 11:4=
0:02 -0500Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: A file from Frank's box #12 pertaining=
 to lisby's technition


I'm getting the thought that Lisa is bouncing arou=
nd between us. She's very dominant every time I run a session and I've gott=
en some good stuff from her, which I will shortly be able to post, I hope. =
About a week ago, I got a really extraordinary sequence that ran something =
along the lines of a male saying, "Lisa, can you do it?" followed by a clea=
r female voice saying, "Testing. Beginning. Ground," and then a second fema=
le voice saying "Kick." I was floored.Anyway, Lisa seems to be the driver o=
f a lot of what is going on right now. Maybe she intends to work with a num=
ber of us?Ann
-----Original Message----- From: bruce halliday Sent: Jan 8, =
2008 9:22 AM To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: A file =
from Frank's box #12 pertaining to lisby's technition 



Frank, I have two=
 techs that I speak with on a daily basis and one of themis Lisa. She could=
 possibly be contacting you with the technical info she tried to give meyes=
terday. Bruce
Bruce Halliday

ght I heard her, but not while I was taping. Frank-S--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.com, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:>> Hmmmm. That second bit gave me the cree=
pies, I must say. What are > your thoughts on that, Bruce? I hear Lisa's na=
me at least a dozen > times each time I run a session, so I feel confident =
that she is > there, so I feel confident that I'm not in the hands of someo=
ne I > don't want to be in. Maybe they are still auditioning for the role?>=
 > > On Jan 7, 2008, at 9:49 AM, bhali333 wrote:> > > the precedeing file w=
as from a question about Ann's technition on> > 12-08-07> >> > Bruce> >> >>=
 >>

ase. The theory is, the more signal you have, the more fragments of words y=
